content.question: Which of the following is a solution to the differential equation <math alttext="x times y prime, minus 2 y, equals 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="y equals, x squared, minus 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, x squared, plus 2 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, 4 times x squared, minus 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, 2 times x cubed, minus 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y equals, 4 times x squared, minus 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
